description: Updates the notification information for a stream.

parameters.name: NotificationConfiguration
parameters.description: The structure containing the information required for notifications. If the structure is null, the configuration will be deleted from the stream. Indicates if a notification configuration is enabled or disabled. The destination information required to deliver a notification to a customer. The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the images will be delivered.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: Indicates if a notification configuration is enabled or disabled.

nested_params.name: DestinationConfig
nested_params.description: The destination information required to deliver a notification to a customer.

nested_params.name: Uri
nested_params.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that identifies where the images will be delivered.
